comments: The 'Email and Password Sign-Up/Login' story does not mention the requirement for social media login, which is a key feature.
The 'Create Blog Post' story lacks acceptance criteria for saving drafts and scheduling posts, which are required features.
The 'Commenting System' story does not include acceptance criteria for notifications related to comments, which is part of the basic notification system requirement.
The 'Email Notifications' story lacks acceptance criteria for in-app notifications, which are part of the basic notification system requirement.
The 'User Management' story does not include criteria for content moderation, which is a required feature for admins.
